name: Tails of Iron: Bright Fir Forest
summary: Set after the climactic events of the base campaign, ‘Bright Fir Forest’, a new free end-game expansion, sees our noble Rat King Redgi invited by the Squirrels to celebrate the Festival of Leaf Fall… However, a new foul and revenge-seeking adversary stands to ruin the celebrations.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Tails of Iron - Bright Fir Forest Trailer | Your Tail Endures... (Free Expansion on All Platforms)
